description.title: Gas: replace tx with a better gas value
description.purpose: The test submits a sequence of transactions against the storage contract with reducing gas compared to the estimate e.g. 90,80,60,40 and 10%. Based on a reference of ganache, we expect the first three to be mined but failed with out of gas, and the latter two to time out as they remain in the mempool. For the transactions that time out, we replace them using the same nonce, but the expected gas.
